entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Way to generate 4xx response when non-nullable model property setter throws ArgumentNullException #54197
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, mvc, plainTextWithFilter #54195
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54194
  • MVC stoped working after update to 8.0.0.2 #54193
  • WithOpenAPI Generates Empty requestBody.content #54189
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #54187
  • Perf regression: https, plainTextWithFilter, plainTextWithFilter #54186
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #54185
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclosehttps, json #54184
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #54183
  • [WebToolsE2E][Aspire] After adding any component, an error occurs "The type or namespace name 'App' could not be found". #54196
  • Metrics for caching #54182
    .NET 9 Planning
  • JsonConverter not called on deserialization when set as property attribute #54181

Closed

  • Cannot get routeData in IExceptionHandler.TryHandleAsync() for ASP.NET Core 8 #54192
  • Welcoming a new member to our Community Triagers group #50469
    Discussions
  • [API Proposal]: Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #51250
    9.0-preview2
  • Happy Holidays, everyone! Responses for issues may be delayed till early January #53026
  • Blazor .NET 8 [RenderModeInteractiveAuto] getting an error #54159
  • Mix static routing with webassemble (auto, etc) modes #54170
  • Perf regression: plaintext, single_query #54129
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper #54160
  • JwtBearer doesn't populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52820
    9.0-preview2
  • Identity pages cannot be reached after migrating Blazor server from 7 to 8 #52610
  • Updated blazor server dotnet 7 to 8. builder.Services.AddCascadingAuthenticationState(); doesn't call GetAuthenticationStateAsync() after login. Old way <CascadingAuthenticationState> component does, but now causes UI flicker. #53369
  • The ValidateAuthenticationStateAsync in the RevalidatingAuthenticationStateProvider in 8.0.X is never called #53286
  • .NET Core dependency injection not working on microsoft docker container (.NET8) #53977
  • InputNumber race condition bug when holding key up to increase the value when internet connection is slow and rendermode is InteractiveServer #53487
  • DataProtectorTokenProvider constructor with ILogger #53963
  • HTTP 413 Payload Too Large even after setting increased request limits .net6 web API #53751
  • AddDataProtection().SetApplicationName does not allow one project to read values set by another #53987

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b75ecf1` to `9d43b27` #54190
    area-infrastructure
  • Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54188
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #54119
    area-auth, community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • fixed DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Doesn't Handle Media Type Subsets #52577 #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview2
  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Manually resolve ref and runtime packs instead of modifying the .NET SDK used in the build #54147
    area-infrastructure
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update OAuthTokenResponse.cs #53763
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] Update Nuget dependencies #54142
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
